ygData.subject: For Jeffrey Sue
ygData.msgSnippet: i don t know your email address, but i saw this on the concert hall board. more laughs from Moshkiae regarding someone who asked whether they should trade for
ygData.messageBody:
i don't know your email address, but i saw this on the concert hall board.
more laughs from Moshkiae regarding someone who asked whether they should
trade for a selo's drum they were offerred:

I think a comparative discussion is in order ...
1. When, will anyone in his right mind be using a Drum in killing dragons?
When he/she wants to die first!
2. How much better is this drum? Ohh, 5% only. That means that you can go
from Qeynos to Freeport in 19 minutes instead of 21. Ohh hell, you are
faster!
3. The piece you are wearing and trading. How hard/easy is it to replace it?
Is it affecting your AC and stats? Will they drop severely? Can you get that
LambaSingDooDah piece to replace it easily enough, so you don't lose much
...
4. Are the animations in this new drum different? Does it look cool when you
have it, and make you want to be a member of Osibisa? Ohhh darn, the store
bough one for 4 gp's looks just like it.
I don't know. Ask me when I get there, but I doubt it, unless the game has
changed and these instruments DO MAKE A DIFFERENCE ... aren't things CAP'd
anyway with limits for all buffs and debuffs?
Moshkiae
----
1. hmm, every time if you are a bard.
2. hmm, 30% or more.
3. what?
4. sigh.
seems he has left EQ-Bards to riddle the concert hall with his
misinformation campaign.

Shada Powa, L55 Wood Elf Troubador
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
